title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Enhancing Design Problem-Solving Skills Through Comparative Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Problem-Solving Methodologies and Work Experience in Social Fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can compare three or more design problem-solving strategies and select context-appropriate approaches
Learners can analyze real-world cases in social studies to visualize problem space structures and derive core constraints.
Learners can improve designed solutions by linking them with peer feedback through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
